abilities.name: Methane Leak
abilities.effect: As long as Dark Weezing is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Pokémon that remains Poisoned between turns.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Darkness Charge
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on Dark Weezing.
